<<<<<<< HEAD
The life and travels of our blessed Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ: with a description of the years of his ministry: as also a description of the wise men of the east, and likewise of the star that guided them; with a just account of the travels of the Virgin Mary.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Printed for P. Brooksby; at the Golden-Ball, near the Hospital-Gate, in West-smith-field, [London] : [1680?]
Caption title. Place and date of publication from Wing. Printed in three columns. With Biblical citations in marginal notes. Imperfect: torn at edge with loss of text. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
